resources.string:
Thoroughly shuffle the card deck
 Divide chips evenly between individuals/groups of players
 Each player/group-Choose one category from music/sounds and one from pictures
 Each player/group-Take2 decision cards-One for betting a wrong answer and one for betting a right answer.
 Each player/group is responsible for their own chip count.
 Each player/group-Ante $25.00 Chip
 Pick a card from the card deck first. Follow the instructions on the card and choose a category to begin.
